Occultations file format is identical to that of KOALA:

1 <- Number of occultation events
-1.561227164502216E+08  -1.584209894526574E+08  -1.377713372660104E+07 <-Earth direction (km) as seen from the asteroid. Ecliptic frame. First event
-1.541363426232943E+01  -8.019448893674740E+00  -3.539637421034669E-01 <-Asteroid velocity (km/s). First event
17.27 <-Not used
18 <-Number of chords
